ayahs.ar: يسٓ
ayahs.en: Ya, Seen

ayahs.ar: وَٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ ٱلۡحَكِيمِ
ayahs.en: By the wise Qur'an

ayahs.ar: إِنَّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ
ayahs.en: Indeed you, [O Muhammad], are from among the messengers

ayahs.ar: عَلَىٰ صِرَٰطٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ
ayahs.en: On a straight path

ayahs.ar: تَنزِيلَ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ
ayahs.en: [This is] a revelation of the Exalted in Might, the Merciful

ayahs.ar: لِتُنذِرَ قَوۡمٗا مَّآ أُنذِرَ ءَابَآؤُهُمۡ فَهُمۡ غَٰفِلُونَ
ayahs.en: That you may warn a people whose forefathers were not warned, so they are unaware

ayahs.ar: لَقَدۡ حَقَّ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ عَلَىٰٓ أَكۡثَرِهِمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
ayahs.en: Already the word has come into effect upon most of them, so they do not believe

ayahs.ar: إِنَّا جَعَلۡنَا فِيٓ أَعۡنَٰقِهِمۡ أَغۡلَٰلٗا فَهِيَ إِلَى ٱلۡأَذۡقَانِ فَهُم مُّقۡمَحُونَ
ayahs.en: Indeed, We have put shackles on their necks, and they are to their chins, so they are with heads [kept] aloft

ayahs.ar: وَجَعَلۡنَا مِنۢ بَيۡنِ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ سَدّٗا وَمِنۡ خَلۡفِهِمۡ سَدّٗا فَأَغۡشَيۡنَٰهُمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يُبۡصِرُونَ
ayahs.en: And We have put before them a barrier and behind them a barrier and covered them, so they do not see

ayahs.ar: وَسَوَآءٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَأَنذَرۡتَهُمۡ أَمۡ لَمۡ تُنذِرۡهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
ayahs.en: And it is all the same for them whether you warn them or do not warn them - they will not believe

ayahs.ar: إِنَّمَا تُنذِرُ مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَ ٱلذِّكۡرَ وَخَشِيَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِۖ فَبَشِّرۡهُ بِمَغۡفِرَةٖ وَأَجۡرٖ كَرِيمٍ
ayahs.en: You can only warn one who follows the message and fears the Most Merciful unseen. So give him good tidings of forgiveness and noble reward

ayahs.ar: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نُحۡيِ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ وَنَكۡتُبُ مَا قَدَّمُواْ وَءَاثَٰرَهُمۡۚ وَكُلَّ شَيۡءٍ أَحۡصَيۡنَٰهُ فِيٓ إِمَامٖ مُّبِينٖ
ayahs.en: Indeed, it is We who bring the dead to life and record what they have put forth and what they left behind, and all things We have enumerated in a clear register

ayahs.ar: وَٱضۡرِبۡ لَهُم مَّثَلًا أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡقَرۡيَةِ إِذۡ جَآءَهَا ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ
ayahs.en: And present to them an example: the people of the city, when the messengers came to it

ayahs.ar: إِذۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡهِمُ ٱثۡنَيۡنِ فَكَذَّبُوهُمَا فَعَزَّزۡنَا بِثَالِثٖ فَقَالُوٓاْ إِنَّآ إِلَيۡكُم مُّرۡسَلُونَ
ayahs.en: When We sent to them two but they denied them, so We strengthened them with a third, and they said, "Indeed, we are messengers to you

ayahs.ar: قَالُواْ مَآ أَنتُمۡ إِلَّا بَشَرٞ مِّثۡلُنَا وَمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ مِن شَيۡءٍ إِنۡ أَنتُمۡ إِلَّا تَكۡذِبُونَ
ayahs.en: They said, "You are not but human beings like us, and the Most Merciful has not revealed a thing. You are only telling lies

ayahs.ar: قَالُواْ رَبُّنَا يَعۡلَمُ إِنَّآ إِلَيۡكُمۡ لَمُرۡسَلُونَ
ayahs.en: They said, "Our Lord knows that we are messengers to you

ayahs.ar: وَمَا عَلَيۡنَآ إِلَّا ٱلۡبَلَٰغُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ
ayahs.en: And we are not responsible except for clear notification

ayahs.ar: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا تَطَيَّرۡنَا بِكُمۡۖ لَئِن لَّمۡ تَنتَهُواْ لَنَرۡجُمَنَّكُمۡ وَلَيَمَسَّنَّكُم مِّنَّا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ
ayahs.en: They said, "Indeed, we consider you a bad omen. If you do not desist, we will surely stone you, and there will surely touch you, from us, a painful punishment

ayahs.ar: قَالُواْ طَـٰٓئِرُكُم مَّعَكُمۡ أَئِن ذُكِّرۡتُمۚ بَلۡ أَنتُمۡ قَوۡمٞ مُّسۡرِفُونَ
ayahs.en: They said, "Your omen is with yourselves. Is it because you were reminded? Rather, you are a transgressing people

ayahs.ar: وَجَآءَ مِنۡ أَقۡصَا ٱلۡمَدِينَةِ رَجُلٞ يَسۡعَىٰ قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ ٱتَّبِعُواْ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ
ayahs.en: And there came from the farthest end of the city a man, running. He said, "O my people, follow the messengers

ayahs.ar: ٱتَّبِعُواْ مَن لَّا يَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ أَجۡرٗا وَهُم مُّهۡتَدُونَ
ayahs.en: Follow those who do not ask of you [any] payment, and they are [rightly] guided

ayahs.ar: وَمَالِيَ لَآ أَعۡبُدُ ٱلَّذِي فَطَرَنِي وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ
ayahs.en: And why should I not worship He who created me and to whom you will be returned

ayahs.ar: ءَأَتَّخِذُ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ ءَالِهَةً إِن يُرِدۡنِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ بِضُرّٖ لَّا تُغۡنِ عَنِّي شَفَٰعَتُهُمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا يُنقِذُونِ
ayahs.en: Should I take other than Him [false] deities [while], if the Most Merciful intends for me some adversity, their intercession will not avail me at all, nor can they save me

ayahs.ar: إِنِّيٓ إِذٗا لَّفِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٍ
ayahs.en: Indeed, I would then be in manifest error

ayahs.ar: إِنِّيٓ ءَامَنتُ بِرَبِّكُمۡ فَٱسۡمَعُونِ
ayahs.en: Indeed, I have believed in your Lord, so listen to me

ayahs.ar: قِيلَ ٱدۡخُلِ ٱلۡجَنَّةَۖ قَالَ يَٰلَيۡتَ قَوۡمِي يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayahs.en: It was said, "Enter Paradise." He said, "I wish my people could know

ayahs.ar: بِمَا غَفَرَ لِي رَبِّي وَجَعَلَنِي مِنَ ٱلۡمُكۡرَمِينَ
ayahs.en: Of how my Lord has forgiven me and placed me among the honored

ayahs.ar: ۞وَمَآ أَنزَلۡنَا عَلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ مِن جُندٖ مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا كُنَّا مُنزِلِينَ
ayahs.en: And We did not send down upon his people after him any soldiers from the heaven, nor would We have done so

ayahs.ar: إِن كَانَتۡ إِلَّا صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ فَإِذَا هُمۡ خَٰمِدُونَ
ayahs.en: It was not but one shout, and immediately they were extinguished

ayahs.ar: يَٰحَسۡرَةً عَلَى ٱلۡعِبَادِۚ مَا يَأۡتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ
ayahs.en: How regretful for the servants. There did not come to them any messenger except that they used to ridicule him

ayahs.ar: أَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ كَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡقُرُونِ أَنَّهُمۡ إِلَيۡهِمۡ لَا يَرۡجِعُونَ
ayahs.en: Have they not considered how many generations We destroyed before them - that they to them will not return

ayahs.ar: وَإِن كُلّٞ لَّمَّا جَمِيعٞ لَّدَيۡنَا مُحۡضَرُونَ
ayahs.en: And indeed, all of them will yet be brought present before Us

ayahs.ar: وَءَايَةٞ لَّهُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ ٱلۡمَيۡتَةُ أَحۡيَيۡنَٰهَا وَأَخۡرَجۡنَا مِنۡهَا حَبّٗا فَمِنۡهُ يَأۡكُلُونَ
ayahs.en: And a sign for them is the dead earth. We have brought it to life and brought forth from it grain, and from it they eat

ayahs.ar: وَجَعَلۡنَا فِيهَا جَنَّـٰتٖ مِّن نَّخِيلٖ وَأَعۡنَٰبٖ وَفَجَّرۡنَا فِيهَا مِنَ ٱلۡعُيُونِ
ayahs.en: And We placed therein gardens of palm trees and grapevines and caused to burst forth therefrom some springs

ayahs.ar: لِيَأۡكُلُواْ مِن ثَمَرِهِۦ وَمَا عَمِلَتۡهُ أَيۡدِيهِمۡۚ أَفَلَا يَشۡكُرُونَ
ayahs.en: That they may eat of His fruit. And their hands have not produced it, so will they not be grateful

ayahs.ar: سُبۡحَٰنَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلۡأَزۡوَٰجَ كُلَّهَا مِمَّا تُنۢبِتُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَمِنۡ أَنفُسِهِمۡ وَمِمَّا لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
ayahs.en: Exalted is He who created all pairs - from what the earth grows and from themselves and from that which they do not know

ayahs.ar: وَءَايَةٞ لَّهُمُ ٱلَّيۡلُ نَسۡلَخُ مِنۡهُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فَإِذَا هُم مُّظۡلِمُونَ
ayahs.en: And a sign for them is the night. We remove from it [the light of] day, so they are [left] in darkness

ayahs.ar: وَٱلشَّمۡسُ تَجۡرِي لِمُسۡتَقَرّٖ لَّهَاۚ ذَٰلِكَ تَقۡدِيرُ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡعَلِيمِ
ayahs.en: And the sun runs [on course] toward its stopping point. That is the determination of the Exalted in Might, the Knowing

ayahs.ar: وَٱلۡقَمَرَ قَدَّرۡنَٰهُ مَنَازِلَ حَتَّىٰ عَادَ كَٱلۡعُرۡجُونِ ٱلۡقَدِيمِ
ayahs.en: And the moon - We have determined for it phases, until it returns [appearing] like the old date stalk

ayahs.ar: لَا ٱلشَّمۡسُ يَنۢبَغِي لَهَآ أَن تُدۡرِكَ ٱلۡقَمَرَ وَلَا ٱلَّيۡلُ سَابِقُ ٱلنَّهَارِۚ وَكُلّٞ فِي فَلَكٖ يَسۡبَحُونَ
ayahs.en: It is not allowable for the sun to reach the moon, nor does the night overtake the day, but each, in an orbit, is swimming

ayahs.ar: وَءَايَةٞ لَّهُمۡ أَنَّا حَمَلۡنَا ذُرِّيَّتَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ ٱلۡمَشۡحُونِ
ayahs.en: And a sign for them is that We carried their forefathers in a laden ship

ayahs.ar: وَخَلَقۡنَا لَهُم مِّن مِّثۡلِهِۦ مَا يَرۡكَبُونَ
ayahs.en: And We created for them from the likes of it that which they ride

ayahs.ar: وَإِن نَّشَأۡ نُغۡرِقۡهُمۡ فَلَا صَرِيخَ لَهُمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يُنقَذُونَ
ayahs.en: And if We should will, We could drown them; then no one responding to a cry would there be for them, nor would they be saved

ayahs.ar: إِلَّا رَحۡمَةٗ مِّنَّا وَمَتَٰعًا إِلَىٰ حِينٖ
ayahs.en: Except as a mercy from Us and provision for a time

ayahs.ar: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ٱتَّقُواْ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيكُمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَكُمۡ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُرۡحَمُونَ
ayahs.en: But when it is said to them, "Beware of what is before you and what is behind you; perhaps you will receive mercy

ayahs.ar: وَمَا تَأۡتِيهِم مِّنۡ ءَايَةٖ مِّنۡ ءَايَٰتِ رَبِّهِمۡ إِلَّا كَانُواْ عَنۡهَا مُعۡرِضِينَ
ayahs.en: And no sign comes to them from the signs of their Lord except that they are from it turning away

ayahs.ar: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمۡ أَنفِقُواْ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ أَنُطۡعِمُ مَن لَّوۡ يَشَآءُ ٱللَّهُ أَطۡعَمَهُۥٓ إِنۡ أَنتُمۡ إِلَّا فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ
ayahs.en: And when it is said to them, "Spend from that which Allah has provided for you," those who disbelieve say to those who believe, "Should we feed one whom, if Allah had willed, He would have fed? You are not but in clear error

ayahs.ar: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَٰذَا ٱلۡوَعۡدُ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ
ayahs.en: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful

ayahs.ar: مَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ تَأۡخُذُهُمۡ وَهُمۡ يَخِصِّمُونَ
ayahs.en: They do not await except one blast which will seize them while they are disputing

ayahs.ar: فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ تَوۡصِيَةٗ وَلَآ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ
ayahs.en: And they will not be able [to give] any instruction, nor to their people can they return

ayahs.ar: وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَإِذَا هُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَجۡدَاثِ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِمۡ يَنسِلُونَ
ayahs.en: And the Horn will be blown; and at once from the graves to their Lord they will hasten

ayahs.ar: قَالُواْ يَٰوَيۡلَنَا مَنۢ بَعَثَنَا مِن مَّرۡقَدِنَاۜۗ هَٰذَا مَا وَعَدَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ وَصَدَقَ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلُونَ
ayahs.en: They will say, "O woe to us! Who has raised us up from our sleeping place?" [The reply will be], "This is what the Most Merciful had promised, and the messengers told the truth

ayahs.ar: إِن كَانَتۡ إِلَّا صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ فَإِذَا هُمۡ جَمِيعٞ لَّدَيۡنَا مُحۡضَرُونَ
ayahs.en: It will not be but one blast, and at once they are all brought present before Us

ayahs.ar: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ لَا تُظۡلَمُ نَفۡسٞ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا تُجۡزَوۡنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
ayahs.en: So today no soul will be wronged at all, and you will not be recompensed except for what you used to do

ayahs.ar: إِنَّ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ فِي شُغُلٖ فَٰكِهُونَ
ayahs.en: Indeed the companions of Paradise, that Day, will be amused in [joyful] occupation

ayahs.ar: هُمۡ وَأَزۡوَٰجُهُمۡ فِي ظِلَٰلٍ عَلَى ٱلۡأَرَآئِكِ مُتَّكِـُٔونَ
ayahs.en: They and their spouses - in shade, reclining on adorned couches

ayahs.ar: لَهُمۡ فِيهَا فَٰكِهَةٞ وَلَهُم مَّا يَدَّعُونَ
ayahs.en: For them therein is fruit, and for them is whatever they request [or wish]

ayahs.ar: سَلَٰمٞ قَوۡلٗا مِّن رَّبّٖ رَّحِيمٖ
ayahs.en: [And] "Peace," a word from a Merciful Lord

ayahs.ar: وَٱمۡتَٰزُواْ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ أَيُّهَا ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ
ayahs.en: [Then He will say], "But stand apart today, you criminals

ayahs.ar: ۞أَلَمۡ أَعۡهَدۡ إِلَيۡكُمۡ يَٰبَنِيٓ ءَادَمَ أَن لَّا تَعۡبُدُواْ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنَۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمۡ عَدُوّٞ مُّبِينٞ
ayahs.en: Did I not enjoin upon you, O children of Adam, that you not worship Satan - [for] indeed, he is to you a clear enemy

ayahs.ar: وَأَنِ ٱعۡبُدُونِيۚ هَٰذَا صِرَٰطٞ مُّسۡتَقِيمٞ
ayahs.en: And that you worship [only] Me? This is a straight path

ayahs.ar: وَلَقَدۡ أَضَلَّ مِنكُمۡ جِبِلّٗا كَثِيرًاۖ أَفَلَمۡ تَكُونُواْ تَعۡقِلُونَ
ayahs.en: And he had already led astray from among you much of creation, so did you not use reason

ayahs.ar: هَٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِي كُنتُمۡ تُوعَدُونَ
ayahs.en: This is the Hellfire which you were promised

ayahs.ar: ٱصۡلَوۡهَا ٱلۡيَوۡمَ بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَكۡفُرُونَ
ayahs.en: [Enter to] burn therein today for what you used to deny

ayahs.ar: ٱلۡيَوۡمَ نَخۡتِمُ عَلَىٰٓ أَفۡوَٰهِهِمۡ وَتُكَلِّمُنَآ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَتَشۡهَدُ أَرۡجُلُهُم بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ
ayahs.en: That Day, We will seal over their mouths, and their hands will speak to Us, and their feet will testify about what they used to earn

ayahs.ar: وَلَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَطَمَسۡنَا عَلَىٰٓ أَعۡيُنِهِمۡ فَٱسۡتَبَقُواْ ٱلصِّرَٰطَ فَأَنَّىٰ يُبۡصِرُونَ
ayahs.en: And if We willed, We could have obliterated their eyes, and they would race to [find] the path, and how could they see

ayahs.ar: وَلَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَمَسَخۡنَٰهُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِهِمۡ فَمَا ٱسۡتَطَٰعُواْ مُضِيّٗا وَلَا يَرۡجِعُونَ
ayahs.en: And if We willed, We could have deformed them, [paralyzing them] in their places so they would not be able to proceed, nor could they return

ayahs.ar: وَمَن نُّعَمِّرۡهُ نُنَكِّسۡهُ فِي ٱلۡخَلۡقِۚ أَفَلَا يَعۡقِلُونَ
ayahs.en: And he to whom We grant long life We reverse in creation; so will they not understand

ayahs.ar: وَمَا عَلَّمۡنَٰهُ ٱلشِّعۡرَ وَمَا يَنۢبَغِي لَهُۥٓۚ إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكۡرٞ وَقُرۡءَانٞ مُّبِينٞ
ayahs.en: And We did not give Prophet Muhammad, knowledge of poetry, nor is it befitting for him. It is not but a message and a clear Qur'an

ayahs.ar: لِّيُنذِرَ مَن كَانَ حَيّٗا وَيَحِقَّ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
ayahs.en: To warn whoever is alive and justify the word against the disbelievers

ayahs.ar: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ أَنَّا خَلَقۡنَا لَهُم مِّمَّا عَمِلَتۡ أَيۡدِينَآ أَنۡعَٰمٗا فَهُمۡ لَهَا مَٰلِكُونَ
ayahs.en: Do they not see that We have created for them from what Our hands have made, grazing livestock, and [then] they are their owners

ayahs.ar: وَذَلَّلۡنَٰهَا لَهُمۡ فَمِنۡهَا رَكُوبُهُمۡ وَمِنۡهَا يَأۡكُلُونَ
ayahs.en: And We have tamed them for them, so some of them they ride, and some of them they eat

ayahs.ar: وَلَهُمۡ فِيهَا مَنَٰفِعُ وَمَشَارِبُۚ أَفَلَا يَشۡكُرُونَ
ayahs.en: And for them therein are [other] benefits and drinks, so will they not be grateful

ayahs.ar: وَٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ءَالِهَةٗ لَّعَلَّهُمۡ يُنصَرُونَ
ayahs.en: But they have taken besides Allah [false] deities that perhaps they would be helped

ayahs.ar: لَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ نَصۡرَهُمۡ وَهُمۡ لَهُمۡ جُندٞ مُّحۡضَرُونَ
ayahs.en: They are not able to help them, and they [themselves] are for them soldiers in attendance

ayahs.ar: فَلَا يَحۡزُنكَ قَوۡلُهُمۡۘ إِنَّا نَعۡلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَ
ayahs.en: So let not their speech grieve you. Indeed, We know what they conceal and what they declare

ayahs.ar: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ أَنَّا خَلَقۡنَٰهُ مِن نُّطۡفَةٖ فَإِذَا هُوَ خَصِيمٞ مُّبِينٞ
ayahs.en: Does man not consider that We created him from a [mere] sperm-drop - then at once he is a clear adversary

ayahs.ar: وَضَرَبَ لَنَا مَثَلٗا وَنَسِيَ خَلۡقَهُۥۖ قَالَ مَن يُحۡيِ ٱلۡعِظَٰمَ وَهِيَ رَمِيمٞ
ayahs.en: And he presents for Us an example and forgets his [own] creation. He says, "Who will give life to bones while they are disintegrated

ayahs.ar: قُلۡ يُحۡيِيهَا ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنشَأَهَآ أَوَّلَ مَرَّةٖۖ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ خَلۡقٍ عَلِيمٌ
ayahs.en: Say, "He will give them life who produced them the first time; and He is, of all creation, Knowing

ayahs.ar: ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلشَّجَرِ ٱلۡأَخۡضَرِ نَارٗا فَإِذَآ أَنتُم مِّنۡهُ تُوقِدُونَ
ayahs.en: [It is] He who made for you from the green tree, fire, and then from it you ignite

ayahs.ar: أَوَلَيۡسَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ بِقَٰدِرٍ عَلَىٰٓ أَن يَخۡلُقَ مِثۡلَهُمۚ بَلَىٰ وَهُوَ ٱلۡخَلَّـٰقُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ
ayahs.en: Is not He who created the heavens and the earth Able to create the likes of them? Yes, [it is so]; and He is the Knowing Creator

ayahs.ar: إِنَّمَآ أَمۡرُهُۥٓ إِذَآ أَرَادَ شَيۡـًٔا أَن يَقُولَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ
ayahs.en: His command is only when He intends a thing that He says to it, "Be," and it is

ayahs.ar: فَسُبۡحَٰنَ ٱلَّذِي بِيَدِهِۦ مَلَكُوتُ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ
ayahs.en: So exalted is He in whose hand is the realm of all things, and to Him you will be returned
